LITURGY.Comment: No Liturgy except for 40 Martyrs, Finding or Annuncation

SAINT.Name: Thursday of the Fourth Week of Lent
Jeudi de la 4-me semaine du Carême

TROPARION.Header:
Tropar de la prophétie dans la 1-re Tone
(Tropar de la Croix)

SEXTE.TROPARION: Sauve ton peuple, Seigneur, et bénis ton héritage, accorde à tes fidèles victoire sur les ennemis et sauvegarde par ta Croix les nations qui t'appartiennent.
Сп҃сѝ гдⷭи лю́ди твоѧ҄, и҆ бл҃гословѝ достоѧ́нїе твоѐ, побѣ҄ды бл҃говѣ́рномꙋ їмпера́торꙋ на́шемꙋ, и҆́мⷬкъ, на сопроти҄вныѧ да́рꙋѧ, и҆ твоѐ сохранѧ́ѧ крⷭто́мъ твои́мъ жи́тельство.

TROPARION.Header:
Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone
(Troparion of the Cross)

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Lord, save Your people and bless Your inheritance; grant victory to the faithful over their adversary, and by the power of your Cross guard your habitation.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: But God is our king before the ages,
He hath wrought salvation in the midst of the earth.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God, why hast Thou cast us off unto the end?

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: But as for me, I will rejoice for ever;
I will chant unto the God of Jacob.
SEXTE.STICHOS: We will confess Thee, O God, we will confess Thee.
